ygData.subject: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, it might be only a 10 point damage shield, but that sounds great.  Think about how bard songs work, they get recast every pulse.  This should reset the
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, it might be only a 10 point damage shield, but that sounds great. Think about how bard songs work, they get "recast" every
pulse. This should reset the damage shield back to 10 each time. With the Healing and Str bonus as well, this might be a very nice
spell.

Wayne

> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: RE: Niv's Melody of Preservation
>
> I thought any hit that exceeded a damage shield's remaining hit absorbtion
> was suffered in full? If this is a 10pt damage shield will it ever help?
>
> Kit
